betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You knew the mirrors would have useful applications, but this is one that took you completely by surprise. Though perhaps you shouldn't have been. You knew the mirrors could manipulate Essentia, so it stood to reason they could manipulate Vis as well.

To start augmenting your wand you'll first need to craft a Wand Augmentation Core. The core only requires an Arcane Workbench to put together, but the augment itself will certainly end up requiring the Infusion Altar.

Â§3A note on the wand instability mechanics mentioned in the Thaumonomicon: If they are actually implemented I have never managed to observe them. You also cannot apply a given augment more than once, so with only two augments mentioning 5% instability each I am doubtful reaching the 25% to trigger Augmentation Invert is possible.

There are two unimplemented augments visible in NEI which perhaps are (were intended to be?) the solution to that mystery. But whether that is the case is beyond me.
